parameters.name: DatastoreId
parameters.description: The AWS-generated ID for the data store to be deleted.

nested_items.name: DatastoreId
nested_items.description: The AWS-generated ID for the data store to be deleted.

nested_items.name: DatastoreArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that gives AWS HealthLake access permission.

nested_items.name: DatastoreStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the data store that the user has requested to be deleted.

nested_items.name: DatastoreEndpoint
nested_items.description: The AWS endpoint for the data store the user has requested to be deleted.
